description: Developing the next generation of AI coding tools for VS Code.
As a core member of the Developer Division Design team, I focus on scaling the impact of designers through the creation of tools, interactive resources, & prototypes for use in developer products.
Led the development of responsive web applications using Vue.js and TypeScript. Implemented accessibility best practices and improved performance by 40%.
I led the concepting, development, technical specification & delivery of 110 physical interactive experiences within the $50M, 60K sq. ft. SPYSCAPE NY museum, all within 18 months.

Combining cutting edge technology with well-considered design thinking to produce concepts, products, tools & experiences for client & internal use. Responsibilities include technical feasibility studies as well as hardware & software prototyping/development.

At Microsoft my job was to bridge design & engineering teams, using multiple methods of prototyping, from high-end 3D printing techniques to mock up electronic circuits & application development that help define & make ideas come to life throughout the entire organisation.
A full time problem solver, harnessing a wide array of technical skills & highly original thinking.
Creating prototypes for concepts & user experience testing through combining industrial design with digital electronics.

As a part of Hack Lab, I assisted in the development of a new technologies & products using a range of techniques, from hardware hacking to 3D printing & making circuit boards with a 3-axis CNC milling machine.
Graduated with a 1st in Innovative Product Design BSc (Hons) at the University of Dundee.
